TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XamlException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 针对一般 XAML 读取器或 XAML 编写器异常引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown for a general XAML reader or XAML writer exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更具体的异常，如存在，并且通常引发而不是。More specific exceptions such as exist and are often thrown instead of . 特定异常通常提供更精确的异常的信息作为属性的异常，或只是因为引发特定异常。Specific exceptions typically provide more precise exception information as properties of the exception, or just because the specific exception was raised.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

summary.span: 一个包含指定错误消息、对造成此异常的内部异常的引用的实例。

span.span: The instance contains a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为前一个异常应包括的引用中的前一个异常引发的异常，属性。An exception that is thrown because a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性将返回相同的值传递到构造函数; 或它将返回`null`如果属性不提供给构造函数的内部异常值。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor; or it returns `null` if the property does not provide the inner exception value to the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Message { get; }
.property instance string Message
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.Message : string

summary.span: 获取或设置异常消息，如果行信息可用，则在消息中追加行信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the exception message, and if line information is available, appends the line information to the message.

value.span: 包含追加的行信息的异常消息。

span.span: The exception message that includes the appended line information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此属性，以便直接包含在消息，因此调试器或其他异常使用者更轻松地看到行信息。 overrides this property so that line information is directly included in the message and is therefore more easily visible for debuggers or other exception consumers. 如果行信息可用时，此属性包含行信息。If line information is available, this property includes the line information. 如果行信息不可用，该消息是基本的消息相同。If line information is unavailable, the message is the same as the base message.
